title: Tile Improvements
description: A list of tile improvements, including build requirements and effects.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the tile improvement.

terrainsCanBeBuiltOn.title: Terrains Can Be Built On
terrainsCanBeBuiltOn.description: Terrains that this improvement can be built on. Removable terrain features will need to be removed before building an improvement. Must be in Terrains.json

turnsToBuild.title: Turns To Build
turnsToBuild.description: Number of turns a worker spends building this. If -1, the improvement is unbuildable [^D]. If 0, the improvement is always built in one turn

techRequired.title: Tech Required
techRequired.description: The name of the technology required to build this improvement

replaces.title: Replaces
replaces.description: The name of a improvement that should be replaced by this improvement. Must be in TileImprovements.json

uniqueTo.title: Unique To
uniqueTo.description: The name of the nation this improvement is unique for

shortcutKey.title: Shortcut Key
shortcutKey.description: Keyboard shortcut key for this improvement (single character).

production.title: Production
production.description: Per-turn bonus Production yield for the tile

food.title: Food
food.description: Per-turn bonus Food yield for the tile

gold.title: Gold
gold.description: Per-turn bonus Gold yield for the tile

science.title: Science
science.description: Per-turn bonus Science yield for the tile

culture.title: Culture
culture.description: Per-turn bonus Culture yield for the tile

faith.title: Faith
faith.description: Per-turn bonus Faith yield for the tile
